column1: Test Cases of Profile Editor Feature

column2: Verify that user is able to update profile after logged-in
column3:
1. Create user by account api with sample payload using loginradius-sdk 
2. Navigate to Site URL
3. Navigate to Login Page
4. Enter Email Id and Password which used in sample payload
5. Click on Login button 
6. Check that navigated to profile page
7. Navigate to Account Menu > Edit Profile
8. Clear already entered data of First Name and Last Name
9. Enter First Name and Last Name 
10. Click on Submit button
column5: User should able to update profile successfully with new data.

column2: Verify that user is able to update profile with blank last name field
column3:
1. Create user by account api with sample payload using loginradius-sdk 
2. Navigate to Site URL
3. Navigate to Login Page
4. Enter Email Id and Password which used in sample payload
5. Click on Login button 
6. Check that navigated to profile page
7. Navigate to Account Menu > Edit Profile
8. Clear already entered data of Last Name
9. Click on Submit button
column5: User should able to update profile successfully with blank Last Name field.
